edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.io

Class CourseRecordIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.io.CourseRecordIO

  • public class CourseRecordIO
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads the course records from text files and writes a set of them to a file
    Author:
    Samuel Ryne Ritter, Prem Subedi

    • Method Detail

      • readCourseRecords

        public static edu.ncsu.csc216.collections.list.SortedList<Course> readCourseRecords(java.lang.String fileName)
                                                                             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Reads course records from a file and creates a list of them. Invalid courses are ignored If the file can't be read a File not found exception is thrown
        Parameters:
        fileName - file that the course records are read from
        Returns:
        a list of valid courses
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file can't be read or found

      • writeCourseRecords

        public static void writeCourseRecords(java.lang.String fileName,
                                      edu.ncsu.csc216.collections.list.SortedList<Course> courses)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the given list of courses to a file
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the file to be written
        courses - Sorted List of courses
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - This can be from an error in the process of creating a file
